item.title: Flarum backup
item.description: 插件address https://extiverse.com/ 记录一下可能需要使用到的插件 https://extiverse.com/extension/acpl/mobile-tab https://extiverse.com/extension/fof/custom-footer https://extiverse.com/extension/askvortsov/flarum-categories https://extiverse.com/extension/fof/stopforumspam https://extiverse.com/extension/v17development/flarum-blog https://extiverse.com/extension/blomstra/usercard-stats https://extiverse.com/extension/justoverclock/custom-html-widget https://extiverse.com/extension/nearata/flarum-ext-signup-confirm-password https://extiverse.com/extension/datlechin/flarum-scroll-buttons https://extiverse.com/extension/pattinsonfuture/lang-traditional-chinese https://extiverse.com/extension/moerio/mixture 测试地址 http://www.youngbird97.top/ 教程正在updating，此篇仅为备忘录
